purpose_text.para: Controls sample filtering by events. The overall filter is the logical AND of these filters. For example, if PMSEVFR_EL1.E[3] and PMSEVFR_EL1.E[5] are both set to 1, only samples that have both event 3 (Level 1 unified or data cache refill) and event 5 (TLB walk) set to 1 are recorded.

field_description.para: Filter on IMPLEMENTATION DEFINED event 63.
An IMPLEMENTATION DEFINED event might be recorded as a multi-bit field. In this case, the corresponding bits of PMSEVFR_EL1 define an IMPLEMENTATION DEFINED filter for the event.
This field is ignored by the PE when PMSFCR_EL1.FE == 0

field_value_description.para: Event 63 is ignored.
Do not record samples that have event 63 == 0.

field.fields_condition: When event 63 is implemented and filtering on event 63 is supported

field_description.para: Reserved, RAZ/WI.
Filter on IMPLEMENTATION DEFINED event 62.
An IMPLEMENTATION DEFINED event might be recorded as a multi-bit field. In this case, the corresponding bits of PMSEVFR_EL1 define an IMPLEMENTATION DEFINED filter for the event.
This field is ignored by the PE when PMSFCR_EL1.FE == 0

field_value_description.para: Event 62 is ignored.
Do not record samples that have event 62 == 0.

field.fields_condition: When event 62 is implemented and filtering on event 62 is supported

field_description.para: Reserved, RAZ/WI.

An IMPLEMENTATION DEFINED event might be recorded as a multi-bit field. In this case, the corresponding bits of PMSEVFR_EL1 define an IMPLEMENTATION DEFINED filter for the event.

field_value_description.para: Event 61 is ignored.

field.fields_condition: When FEAT_SPEv1p4 is not implemented, event 31 is implemented, and filtering on event 31 is supported

field.fields_condition: When event 12 is implemented and filtering on event 12 is supported

This field is ignored by the PE when PMSFCR_EL1.FE == 0.

field_value_description.para: Misalignment event is ignored.
Do not record samples that have the Misalignment event == 0.

field_description.para: Reserved, RAZ/WI.

This field is ignored by the PE when PMSFCR_EL1.FE == 0.

field_value_description.para: Remote access event is ignored.
Do not record samples that have the Remote access event == 0.

field.fields_condition: When (FEAT_SPEv1p4 is implemented or filtering on event 10 is optionally supported) and event 10 is implemented

field_description.para: Reserved, RAZ/WI.
Filter on Last Level cache miss event.
This field is ignored by the PE when PMSFCR_EL1.FE == 0.

field_value_description.para: Last Level cache miss event is ignored.
Do not record samples that have the Last Level cache miss event == 0.

field.fields_condition: When (FEAT_SPEv1p4 is implemented or filtering on event 9 is optionally supported) and event 9 is implemented

field_description.para: Reserved, RAZ/WI.
Filter on Last Level cache access event.
This field is ignored by the PE when PMSFCR_EL1.FE == 0.

field_value_description.para: Last Level cache access event is ignored.
Do not record samples that have the Last Level cache access event == 0.

field.fields_condition: When (FEAT_SPEv1p4 is implemented or filtering on event 8 is optionally supported) and event 8 is implemented

field_description.para: Reserved, RAZ/WI.
Filter on Mispredicted event.
This field is ignored by the PE when PMSFCR_EL1.FE == 0.

field_value_description.para: Mispredicted event is ignored.
Do not record samples that have the Mispredicted event == 0.

field_description.para: Filter on Not taken event.
This field is ignored by the PE when PMSFCR_EL1.FE == 0.

field_value_description.para: Not taken event is ignored.
Do not record samples that have the Not taken event == 0.

field_description.para: Reserved, RAZ/WI.
Filter on TLB walk event.
This field is ignored by the PE when PMSFCR_EL1.FE == 0.

field_value_description.para: TLB walk event is ignored.
Do not record samples that have the TLB walk event == 0.

field_description.para: Filter on TLB access event.
This field is ignored by the PE when PMSFCR_EL1.FE == 0.

field_value_description.para: TLB access event is ignored.
Do not record samples that have the TLB access event == 0.

field.fields_condition: When FEAT_SPEv1p4 is implemented or filtering on event 4 is optionally supported

field_description.para: Reserved, RAZ/WI.
Filter on Level 1 data cache refill or miss event.
This field is ignored by the PE when PMSFCR_EL1.FE == 0.

field_value_description.para: Level 1 data cache refill or miss event is ignored.
Do not record samples that have the Level 1 data cache refill or miss event == 0.

field_description.para: Filter on Level 1 data cache access event.
This field is ignored by the PE when PMSFCR_EL1.FE == 0.

field_value_description.para: Level 1 data cache access event is ignored.
Do not record samples that have the Level 1 data cache access event == 0.

field.fields_condition: When FEAT_SPEv1p4 is implemented or filtering on event 2 is optionally supported

field_description.para: Reserved, RAZ/WI.
Filter on Architecturally retired event.
This field is ignored by the PE when PMSFCR_EL1.FE == 0.

If the PE does not support the sampling of speculative instructions, or always discards the sample record for speculative instructions, this bit reads as an UNKNOWN value and the PE ignores its value.

field_value_description.para: Architecturally retired event is ignored.
Do not record samples that have the Architecturally retired event == 0.

field.fields_condition: When the PE supports sampling of speculative instructions

field_description.para: Reserved, UNKNOWN.
Reserved, RAZ/WI.

ps.name: MRS
MSRregister
